attributes.additional_details:
The sickening sight of two beautiful horses losing their lives at the most notorious racecourse in the world, proves yet again the brutality of horse racing! We must put an end to brutality for money and someone must be these animals voice.
The sickening sight of two beautiful horses losing their lives at the most notorious racecourse in the world, proves yet again the brutality of horse racing The League Against Cruel Sports has previously called for the abolition of the Aintree Grand National
attributes.background: Two horses had to be put down at Aintree after injuring themselves in races at the  Grand National Forest des Aigles broke a foreleg before jumping a fence and Crucial Role was destroyed after a “horrific fall
